meanings.definition: A book that has had a large and rapid sale.
meanings.sent1: The bestseller was flying off the shelves at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The new novel by the famous author quickly became a bestseller.
meanings.sent3: The librarian joked that the bestseller was so popular, it needed its own security guard.
meanings.sent4: Her latest release was a bestseller, capturing the hearts of readers everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The bestseller was like a shining star in the literary world, outshining all other books.

meanings.definition: A product, especially a book, that is among those sold in the largest numbers.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore featured the latest bestseller prominently in the window display.
meanings.sent2: The author's memoir became a bestseller within weeks of its release.
meanings.sent3: The bestseller was so popular that even the author couldn't keep up with the demand.
meanings.sent4: In the world of literature, being a bestseller is like winning a gold medal.
meanings.sent5: The bestseller stood out on the shelves, beckoning readers to pick it up and dive into its pages.
